ygData.subject: Re: Can you believe it? (RACIST, dun read if u r not High Elves! Heh)
ygData.msgSnippet: Reasons for them NOT being able to get a kill 1. They are stupid asses who prolly don t even know their way around Norrath, and they prolly get their level
ygData.messageBody:
Reasons for them NOT being able to get a kill
1. They are stupid asses who prolly don't even know their way around
Norrath, and they prolly get their level from friends who twink and level
them. In other words, LOSERS
2. They are Dark Elves. Low Wisdom High Int in the end got mana to nuke but
get no kill cause they DUNNO how to nuke.
P.S. Guild is called Order of black STAFF so if you see them, don't bother
trying to share kills, just take everything =)

Leshrec Kalesk'Thor
-----Original Message-----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: '* Singapore EQ Mailing List' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, September 06, 1999 11:51 AM
Subject: [sg-everquest] Can you believe it? (RACIST, dun read if u r not
High Elves! Heh)


>From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
>Venue - Treant Camp
>Kakis Party - Ziltus (32 HE wiz), Leshrec (31 HE wiz), Zanderion (31 HE
>magi)
>Opposition Party - Nanxxxxx (40 DE wiz), Maar (31 DE wiz), Fatez (30 wiz)
>
>3 of us is chopping trees happily at camp, while this Fatez come over to
>join. Frankly speaking, at lvl 32 I dun get XP for some of the trees
>chopped (2 persons I still get xp from ALL trees). Thus, we told him we
>are unable to accpet him.
>
>Next round, Fatez start to nuke after we casted, and he get a kill. Fine,
>we said, if he capable of FFA, so shall it be (NOTE: We have no objection
>against FFA, but we hate pple use us to tank for them to hunt for xp). So
>next round, we let him take both. In the end, he almost died and we nuke a
>bit. I even bandage him and explain to him why we cant let him joined.
> This bastard say yes, and YET after he recover, he KS again! WTF? In the
>end, Les/Zan take front tree, I take back tree, he get nothing. He then
>started to curse and sweat me, no big deal, I see lots of cry babies like
>him all the time, but really sux to see a wiz like him cry, LOL.
>
>After seeing no response from me, he threatened me to get his lvl 40 wiz
>friends come. No big deal, I told our guys, and Les said the most we leave
>if that lvl 40 wiz get all kills lor. Anyway Fatez also won't get any xp
>teaming with lvl 40. So we stayed and waited. Asshole really called a lvl
>40 & a lvl 31 wiz, all 3 from same guild called Order of the Black "Cocks"
>(ok it's not cocks, but they are so stupid tat we called them cocks).
>
>So...War of Century Nuking started!
>
>Been a lvl 40 wiz, that DE is casting using the same spells we are using
>(most powerful lvl 29 dd spells), but that spell dam rise with lvl. By
>right, he shld have won all the kills. In the end, guess wat? We got more
>than 95% of the kills! LOL! It's really no faces for a grp of 3 wiz (lvl
>40, 31, 30) to lose kill to a grp of 2 wiz (lvl 32/31) /1 magi (lvl 31),
>esp Zan is doing more like a traffice control in the camp (to kill
>wandering animals to prevent them blocking our target).
>
>To me, it's just a very simple tricks that we are doing, but I'm not going
>to disclose here ;) More like a common sense for nukers but the 3 DE wiz
>dun seems to know it, which make us ponder how they get their lvl, esp the
>lvl 40 wiz.
>
>Funny thing is that after an hr or so, that lvl 40 wiz started to msg me,
>saying he gave up and asking how we win kills (Les and me always cast b4
>them). Of coz I wont say lah, since that grp got no honor, heal them help
>them still fight with us. So we make up of 2 stupid reasons, which they
>believe at least one of them:
>
>1. Our guild has pool resources of 1000k pp, and buy this artifact from GM.
> This artifact works like HT, and it allows us to get kills most of the
>time. LOL.
>2. When asked abt how we cast faster, I told him we got OC10 (I also dunno
>what's tat, Zan taught me to sian), which is pipeline for internet, blah
>blah blah, and we see mobs 1-2 secs b4 them, and that's why we won most of
>the kills. This they believed.
>
>I'm right - after I told them, 3 bastards still try to fight for kills,
>LOL. And of coz, they lost all. In the end the lvl 40 & lvl 31 wiz left,
>left that fu*ker Fatez, who still hang ard for 30 min or so, trying to get
>a kill. In the end we gloat and suan him alot, he so pissed that he said
>he wanna beat us up in RL, LOL.
>
>Never been my EQ life I feel so shiok wining a lvl 40 wiz, good work guys.
>FYI, I'm using only 56k and Les 28k/32k. We all know Les got a slow system
>yet he also cast b4 that grp, really solid!
>
>Funny thing is that Les and me are not KSer, yet we can do it very well.
> Shld we KS, I believe we will get better loot and higher lvls. But alas,
>KS is not our cup of tea ;)
>
>The fact that it's a grp of HE (lower INT, lower LVL, less nukers) wons a
>grp of DE (higher INT, higher LVL, more nukers) make the victory a special
>one.
>
>LONG LIVE HIGH ELVES!!!
>
>Ziltus Planeswalker.
>
